Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Averardo Vault
Description: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Averardo Vault to her.
QuestDesc: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Averardo Vault to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These seem to be the advertising brochures from Averardo Bank...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some notes on them are really interesting. Fuling even marked them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it seems that the name Montelli holds a special meaning for them...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These brochures are quite intriguing. Thank you, {PlayerName}.
